channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NH
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NH

item.title: Report X-2024030234
item.description:
Report X-2024030234

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-15T15:11:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-01
  • City: LONDONDERRY
  • State: NH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package started leaking while on the road on a van. Driver left it in the van leaking, discovered by someone and cleaned up in-house. DescribePack: One of 4 bottles cracked along seam on underside of handle, leaking all over the other 3. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: Driver had put a thing plastic bag around box to contain liquid

item.title: Report E-2024030338
item.description:
Report E-2024030338

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-20T15:11:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-26
  • City: BELMONT
  • State: NH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDEX FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Associate did not block and/or brace freight properly for transport. Freight was crushed causing release of product.
